entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is about to embark on a journey.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A wizard who seems to guess Harry's feelings and provides guidance.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character mentioned as having told the Death Eaters information about Harry.

relationships.description: Moody provides guidance to Harry on how to avoid being targeted by the Death Eaters.
Snape has betrayed Harry's trust by telling the Death Eaters information about him.
